name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Republican members of the U.S. House of Representatives are drafting a bill that may revoke China's permanent normal trade relations status.
The Chinese Foreign Ministry responded: The United States granted China permanent normal trade relations status in 2001. Some U.S. politicians are trying to reverse history and violate WTO rules. We urge relevant U.S. lawmakers to abide by WTO rules and stop their words and deeds that harm others and do not benefit themselves.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 9, Dazhu County, Sichuan. It was revealed online that Dazhu Middle School has strict management of students, with students having only 40 minutes for lunch and not being allowed to leave school in the afternoon. A series of regulations caused dissatisfaction among students and collective protests. Students wrote on paper, "Fight, students of Dazhu Middle School, against autocratic rule"
Some students waved the party flag in the corridor to vent their dissatisfaction.

At least 38 people were hit.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Sources said Trump will choose U.S. Senator Marco Rubio as Secretary of State. Rubio has advocated a tough foreign policy against the United States' geopolitical enemies, including China, Iran, Cuba and other countries, for many years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 12, the Consulate General of Japan in Guangzhou issued a warning about the Zhuhai collision incident: Recently, many vicious incidents have occurred in China. When talking with Chinese people, respect local customs and habits, pay attention to the surrounding environment and words and deeds. Avoid going out alone at night, and be careful even during the day. Don't speak loudly in Japanese. Pay attention to the surrounding environment when going out, especially in places where people gather, such as squares.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 12, a video of an explosion at Zhuhai Stadium was circulated online. In the video, a number of cars outside a restaurant were blown away.
After verification, the location was a restaurant on the third floor of Shuikou Sanitary Ware Expo City in Kaiping, Jiangmen City, which had not been open for a long time.
Earlier, the Jiangmen government responded that it was a film and television drama shooting.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 12, the Zhuhai Air Show security inspection site.
Security personnel carefully inspected each car.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 12 (Released) Hebei. A blogger said that Zhang Weiwei said that China has already achieved a clear lead in many fields.
But taking artificial intelligence as an example, the strongest intelligent chip is undoubtedly NVIDIA, and natural language processing is led by OpenAI. Our large model products were actually followed after OpenAI became popular, but why do some people still support Zhang Weiwei without thinking? I think it is because the butt determines the brain, and emotions precede thinking.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 11, CCTV Military released a poster: Will we fight?
However, the poster did not emphasize that it was the anniversary of the founding of the Air Force, but instead emphasized "resisting the US and aiding Korea, defending the country", and also included a "join the war" button.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Paper, 2020: Post-marital depression is becoming the biggest killer of women who are urged to get married.
2024-11-11 Global Times: Married people are less likely to be depressed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 12, Zhuhai Sports Center was closed and police were stationed outside the door.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 12, the State Council issued a decision to amend the "National Holiday and Memorial Day Holiday Regulations". The Spring Festival is 4 days, Labor Day is 2 days, and National Day is 3 days.
The total number of statutory holidays has increased from 11 days to 13 days.
And new clauses have been added to encourage the formation of actual longer holidays through adjustment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 12 (Released) An old man talks about his opinion on "Israel bombing many Gaza children": The old man said that Hamas hid in schools and hospitals, held ordinary civilians hostage and did not let them leave, and they were bombed to death. Whose sin is this? Hamas did this just to gain sympathy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 11 (Release) a reporter wrote about his experience in the past three years and the changes in the news environment.
In the past three years, he witnessed the decline of the media under the pressure of censorship, the retreat of investigative media, the transformation of routine reports into sensitive news, and the media's privilege to report sensitive news. He himself also suffered from political depression...

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to @sudong0606, Peng Chenliang's actual death date was November 4th.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 11, Phoenix Weekly reported: A Shanghai stock investor born in the 2000s made 50 million yuan in four years of stock trading, which triggered ridicule from netizens.
Netizens responded, "I am a security guard at the gate, and I made 100 million yuan."
"I am Qin Shihuang."
"You are trying to trick me into stock trading again."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 11, Guangdong Huipulai Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd.: Due to the bad environment and heavy debt, the company decided to officially close down.
On November 9, Shenzhen Wangxin Precision Industry Co., Ltd.: Due to operating difficulties and capital shortages in recent years, it will close down on November 9.
On November 4, Dongguan Weinuo New Energy: Due to poor management, it decided to suspend operations.
On July 22, Shenzhen Ruijun Semiconductor Co., Ltd.: Due to the reduction of company orders, it decided to suspend operations.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Guangdong Zhuhai reported another incident of hitting people at the sports center: 
35 people were killed and 43 were injured. The driver used a knife to injure himself in the car. The police immediately stopped him and sent him to the hospital for treatment.

content: Reported on November 11, the National Development and Reform Commission: It is necessary to build a domestic circulation dominated by domestic demand.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 9, Laos. Travel blogger "Xiaokui" posted a video saying that he was fined by the security guard at the high-speed railway station built with Chinese aid for throwing cigarette butts, and the other party also took out the WeChat QR code. The blogger said that he did not smoke at all. "The Laotians only rip off the Chinese. This is obviously a high-speed railway station built with Chinese aid. I feel that China gave money to a group of ungrateful people." Netizens replied "Why don't you light the Chinese red flag?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 12, a big V expressed his opinion on the "Zhuhai car crash incident": We should care about the people and things around us, because individual misfortune may turn into collective misfortune, which cannot be solved by whitewashing. The more whitewashing, the greater the harm.
The government should provide relief to the poor and help the needy groups overcome difficulties, thereby enhancing the happiness of the "vulnerable groups" to ensure social stability and harmony.
At present, the article has been deleted by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens found that Zhuhai police released two different versions of the notice. In the latest version, the content that the suspect Fan and his ex-wife had a dispute over the division of property after the divorce, and went to court many times and filed for a retrial because he was dissatisfied with the verdict was deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 10, Mianyang, Sichuan. A parent pointed to the illustration in the textbook and said to his child: The red circle in the book is the Japanese flag. The circle can be other colors, but it cannot be red, so this is a poisonous textbook.
Netizens responded, "What if the sun is still in the sky? Should we ask Hou Yi for help?"
"You didn't cross the traffic light this morning?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The property management of Zhuhai Wuzhou Flower City Phase II community issued a notice: all collective activities such as mass gatherings and square dancing will be suspended in the near future.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 11, Shaanxi. An old man set up a stall on the roadside to sell Chairman Mao's quotations, Chairman Mao's poems and calligraphy and other books, while the urban management could only stand aside and watch from a distance, not daring to approach.
Netizens replied, "In principle, you can't set up a stall, but he is setting up the principle"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added that the Zhuhai Sports Center is just opposite the Zhuhai Intermediate People’s Court where Fan appealed.
